attributes.action: Look into the imbalance in the money spent of food for the armed forces and those in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From a recent television programme about life on HMS Illustrious it came to light that, apparently, we spend more per person per day on food for those in prision than for our navy personnel. If this is the case it is a national disgrace and the imbalance should be addressed.
